As a DOTA 2 Player, I installed CS:GO to have some fun when I am tired of Peruvians feeding on my matchmaking, my account is a CS:GO Prime account, It took me around 20 hours of gameplay to calibrate my MMR and give me my rank. The problem I have with the game is: IT IS FULL OF CHEATERS. MY 10 Calibration matches were PAINFUL because there was a cheater on almost EVERY-SINGLE-GAME! Add me and I can send you'll the replays and you will definitely laugh (or cry) with me. Pls Valve, you destroyed my DOTA, now it is time to ruin your own title it seems!
